resource.name: Google/google
resource.description: Displays a form to search in Google.

attribute.description: Comma-delimited list of types of search to perform. Available values are: web,local,video,blog,news,book, and image
attribute.name: searchers

attribute.description: For local searches, enter the address or location where to search
attribute.label: Display Mode
attribute.name: localSearchCenterPoint
